title: Who Do You Like More, Mom or Dad? - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Artifacts   Beautiful Female Lead   Bullying   Child Protagonist   Doting Parents   Elemental Magic   European Ambience   Family   Famous Parents   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Magic   Maids   Mysterious Family Background   Mysterious Past   Nobles   Poor to Rich
author: 홍마루
description:
Diana became an orphaned maid after her mother died.

“This is now your legacy.”

One day, a close friend of her mother appeared in front of her and gave her an enormous inheritance. But, her deceased mother had even more secrets than just her legacy—

My mother is the only child of Count Ohrid, the continent’s richest person, and my father is the Master of the Red Flames, Grand Duke of Nohibaden, you say?

“Diana will, of course, succeed Ohrid, Grand Duke.”

“Diana is my daughter. She must succeed Nohibaden’s name.”

Do I have to choose one between the two…?>
